title: Yukon - Charley Rivers National Preserve: Yukon River Hyperlapse
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Virtual Tour     Yukon River Hyperlapse                Yukon River Hyperlapse            Â                      Yukon River Hyperlapse A hyperlapse is a moving timelapse and, in this case, it is of the 100 mile stretch of Yukon River from Eagle, Alaska to Slaven's Roadhouse in Yukon-Charley Rivers National Preserve. Complete with notable location descriptions, this virtual tour of the Yukon River is for entertainment and basic orientation purposes. Please use it as a visual and mental reference, in addition to proper river information and maps. Enjoy a boat ride down the Yukon, regardless of your location or the weather!  Duration:7 minutes, 48 seconds
